lead_paragraph: Sean McAllister, a British documentary filmmaker, was arrested in the Syrian capital, Damascus, last week while working secretly for Britain's Channel 4 News. In an interview broadcast on Tuesday, after his release, Mr. McAllister described his captivity, and the torture of detained activists he overheard from his cell.
